gameUI

Class AnimationSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameUI.AnimationSet

  • public class AnimationSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a character's appearance based on their action.
    Author:
    Geoffrey Longuet (longuegeof)

      AnimationSet(MortalObject character, java.lang.String imagesLoc)
      Constructs an AnimationSet object to manage a player's image based on their current action.

        public AnimationSet(MortalObject character,

        Constructs an AnimationSet object to manage a player's image based on their current action.

        imagesLoc - The string file root of the player's animations.

      • updateImage

        public java.awt.Image updateImage(GameMap.PlayerAction act,
                                  Renderer.Direction dir)
        Advance the player's frame by one and set it to the current image.
        Parameters:
        act - The PlayerAction in progress
        dir - The direction of the character image to get.
        Returns:
        The image which is updated and now the currentImage.
